case.name: MZYAY v Minister for Immigration and Citizenship [2009] FCA 644 (16 June 2009)

citances.sentence: The applicant sought review of the delegate's decision and the Tribunal, differently constituted, affirmed the delegate's decision [in] May 2008. The applicant applied for judicial review of the Tribunal's decision by the Federal Magistrates Court and [in] February 2009 the Court dismissed the application. However, the applicant then appealed to the Federal Court, and [in] June 2009 the Court set aside the decision of the Federal Magistrates Court and in lieu thereof quashed the decision of the Tribunal and remitted the matter to be determined according to law: MZYAY v Minister for Immigration and Citizenship [2009] FCA 644
